content:
[
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-001-001",
    "action": "Elias performs his evening maintenance routine on the lighthouse lens mechanism, noting unusual grinding sounds from the rotation gears",
    "intention": "Establish normalcy before introducing equipment failure",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 0,
    "information_revealed": ["The lighthouse lens requires regular maintenance", "Elias is methodical in his duties"],
    "information_withheld": ["The true cause of the mechanical problems", "What the ocean changes signify"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-001-002",
    "action": "The lens mechanism jams completely during rotation, leaving the light fixed in one direction as Elias struggles with the controls",
    "intention": "Introduce the primary equipment failure",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["The lighthouse equipment is failing", "Elias cannot immediately fix the problem"],
    "information_withheld": ["Whether this is natural wear or supernatural interference", "The full extent of the malfunction"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-001-003",
    "action": "While examining the frozen lens, Elias notices the ocean surface appears unusually still and dark, with no visible waves despite the wind",
    "intention": "Introduce supernatural ocean changes",
    "pivot": true,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["The ocean is behaving unnaturally", "The changes coincide with the equipment failure"],
    "information_withheld": ["What lies beneath the still water", "The connection between mechanical and natural phenomena"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-001-004",
    "action": "Elias attempts to manually force the lens rotation, but the mechanism resists with an almost organic resistance, as if something is holding it in place",
    "intention": "Escalate the supernatural elements affecting the equipment",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["The resistance feels unnatural", "Normal mechanical solutions are ineffective"],
    "information_withheld": ["What force is interfering with the mechanism", "Whether Elias is imagining the organic quality"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-001-005",
    "action": "Looking out at the fixed beam of light cutting across the motionless ocean, Elias sees something large moving just beneath the surface in the illuminated area",
    "intention": "Provide first clear supernatural manifestation",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 1,
    "information_revealed": ["Something large exists in the ocean", "It appears drawn to or revealed by the lighthouse beam"],
    "information_withheld": ["The nature and size of the creature", "Whether it is aware of Elias watching"]
  },
  {
    "beat_id": "BEAT-SCN-ARC-003-001-006",
    "action": "The shape disappears as suddenly as it appeared, and the ocean begins to move again with normal waves, but the lens mechanism remains frozen",
    "intention": "Create uncertainty about what was witnessed while maintaining the central problem",
    "pivot": false,
    "tension_delta": 0,
    "information_revealed": ["The ocean disturbance was temporary", "The equipment problem persists"],
    "information_withheld": ["Whether the sighting was real", "If the creature will return", "How to repair the lighthouse"]
  }
]
